subject: Travel
subcategory: The Story of Maps and Navigation
title: Google Maps Changes the World
description: One-minute skill: Google Maps Changes the World.

hook.text: Before Google Maps launched in 2005, most people navigated with folded paper maps that never folded back right.

buildup.text: Google bought a small mapping startup and combined satellite imagery with street data and search.

discovery.text: Street View launched in 2007. Cars with roof cameras drove every road, photographing the entire world.

twist.text: Google Maps has been used to discover ancient ruins, catch cheating spouses, and spot military secrets.

climax.text: Over one billion people use Google Maps monthly. It has replaced paper maps almost entirely.

punchline.text: One app made getting lost nearly impossible.
